title: AKA vs. Everyone Else
itunes:title: AKA vs. Everyone Else
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what the hatred is when it comes to the sorority the AKA's and even had friend to the show Eboni K Williams call up and defend her sorority sisters. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Red's broadcaster Tom Brennaman for using a slur on the airways and giving a half apology. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see what the hatred is when it comes to the sorority the AKA's and even had friend to the show Eboni K Williams call up and defend her sorority sisters. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Red's broadcaster Tom Brennaman for using a slur on the airways and giving a half apology. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee"
